ComicInfo.Title: Concrete Jungle
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:06:24. [Issue ID 37026]
ComicInfo.Tags: Ken Clarkson,X-O Manowar [also as Aric],Turok,Rhonda (hostess),Eddie Gibbons,bionisauruses,Con Edison workers [Blaustein,Sabatini]
ComicInfo.Summary: Prehistory and present day collide as hyper-intelligent dinosaurs ransack Manhattan! With mankind suddenly at the bottom of the food chain, Aric will need to enlist some help to win this fight. But will the combined might of X-O Manowar and his new allies be enough to save New York from these cannibalistic sauroid underground dwellers?
